sentence: We stayed in am Ocean Panorama Pool villa and it was faultless loads of space pillow choice indoor and outdoor shower large outdoor living area and small but relaxing pool
Last but not least the facilities at the villa and the villa itself with his private pool is the top of luxury and perfect for a couple who desire to spend time together
The Beachfront Pool Villa Suite was at once luxurious and homey full of character and charm without sacrificing any luxury
Food is great if not fantastic the view at the hilltop is breathtaking you must see the sunrise and if you like to relax in your bungalow at the pool this is the perfect place for you
Our girls had a separate villa next to the pool and we had the main villa above

Watch a movie on the beach or try out waterspouts such as paddle boarding and windsurfing completely free of chargeGuests were also offered complimentary afternoon tea by the hilltop pool which was delicious one rainy day
Try and get a sea view and plunge pool its amazing
Spent a good deal of our time just relaxing by our own private infinity pool
our Villa with pool and sea view had maximum necessary privacy
Both Villa and Hilltop Pool are amazing
hill top infinity pool were OK but are the major part of the one step away from Paradise
villas on either side of us had screaming kids in the pool which definitely took away from our experience and enjoyment
It was 2 separate villas sharing a pool and connected by outdoor stairs
As you go down the stairs you see your own private pool and the HUGE windows all around the villa

Having said all that the limestone islands of Phang Nga Bay are spectacular the lagoons in some of them are breathtaking there are good places for swimming although some strong currents and the sea not very clear for snorkeling due to the windy weather

Combined with the far out of the Hornbill Club and the rather less maintained facilities and the lack of making the Hilltop Pool to a central kids freindly pool where parents and kids coudl easily meet and connect these are the pointers we woudl like to share from our side
Sei es am privaten Pool am privaten Strand eingebetet in einer Bucht
Who ever heard of a pool at a tropical resort opening at 10
Such a shame as the view from the pool was stunning
We had a beach front villa with pool N2 during 2 days

the service and friendliness from all staff was amazing The negatives the villa was in need of updating and felt 354 star not 5 the villa pool desperately needed renovating with green mould round the water line and engrained dirt on the bottom which was a particular let down the food and drinks prices were so overpriced it changed our behaviour as we just could n’t bring ourselves to pay the amount they wanted £ 20 glass of wine £ 25 sandwich
The common pool has the best views especially for sunrises but you had never know because it is closed
Only downside was the number of jelly fish and tides that meant we could nt swim in the sea
But what was not addressed was that the pool would still be closed until 11 am which is disappointing as a paying guest
Movies on the beach is a nice idea but there are loads of mosquitoes and if you like swimming in the sea beware the jellyfish
The shower and pool though clean suffer from age and ingrained marks which make it look dirty even though it is not
The pool upstairs should be open 24 hours or if not you should build a new one down between the living room and the beach

You could have a map book meals spa sessions and trips order room service even have an indicator about the busyness of the beach or pool so you do not trundle up the hill to find there is no room another gripe about the facilitiesAs I say we just want to be constructive here and these are our own thoughts based on the various other first class resorts we have stayed at
Arriving at the pool fully dressed hot and sweaty from your trip and walking around looking at the space and the people lying in it is odd to say the least

In the morning people crowd the car park beach wanting to sunbath and cool off in some water and the only option is a pool at their villa lovely to have but not everyones idea of where to spend lots of time or the sea
It does n’t have the most beautiful beach but the swimming pool on top of the hill probably has the most stunning view you could find in Thailand
